text: Hans Rudolf "Hansrüdi" Spillman (born 7 January 1932) is a retired Swiss sports shooter. Spillman won silver medals in the rifle 300 m three positions event at the 1960 Olympics and 1962 World Championships.Hansrüdi Spillman . sports-reference.com ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Sport shooters Category:Sportspeople from Zürich
title: Hans Rudolf Spillmann
